
{{Client function}}
This function returns the type of the specified projectile.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
int getProjectileType ( projectile theProjectile )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/projectile.md|projectile]]:getType|type}}

===Required Arguments===
*'''theProjectile:''' The [[/Element/Projectile.md|projectile]] element which type you want to retrieve.

==Returns==
Returns an [[/int.md|int]]eger over the type of the projectile or ''false'' if invalid arguments were passed.
{{Projectiles}}

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function projectileCreation()
	local theType = getProjectileType(source)
	outputChatBox("A projectile was created! It's type: "..theType)
end
addEventHandler("onClientProjectileCreation", getRootElement(), projectileCreation)
</syntaxhighlight>
